record.screen: {["kmquery.default", "ENG", $L.title, $L.format, true, , {[{$rel=nullsub($rel, "desc"), $sta=nullsub($sta, ""), $mdate=nullsub($mdate, ""), $sortinfo=nullsub($sortinfo, "score desc"), $sortbymulti=nullsub($sortbymulti, true), if ($G.client.type="mobile") then ($L.title=scmsg(132, "sm")), if $enable.idol.global.search then ($L.format="idol.global.search")}, , ]}, "do nothing", {[, , , "left", , ]}, "kmquery.default", , true, 50, "falcon", '03/24/15 22:43:58', , "system.library.KMSearchQuery.getSectionDisplayNames();", ]}

ds.desc.ds.desc: Expert Search;Specify expert criteria for your search
Open Request;Open a request using the search text

ds.cond.ds.cond: evaluate(views in $L.env) and lng(denull(views in $L.fc))>0 and index($L.format, {"ocmoptions.l", "ocmoptions.o", "ocmoptions.q"})=0
gui() and type($L.dd.qbe.format)~=2 and $L.dd.reclist~=0 and nullsub($L.mod.columns, true)

ds.exps.ds.exps: for $m = 1 to lng(knowledgebases in $L.file) do (1 in $m in kblist in $L.file=true)
for $m = 1 to lng(knowledgebases in $L.file) do (1 in $m in kblist in $L.file=false)
if (filename($L.filed)="group") then if $cau.add.to.group then (member in $L.filed=insert(member in $L.filed, 1, 1, $cau.operator.name))
if (filename($L.filed)="cm3profilegrp") then if $cau.add.to.group then (members in $L.filed=insert(members in $L.filed, 1, 1, $cau.operator.name))
if (filename($L.filed)="assignment") then if $cau.add.to.group then (operators in $L.filed=insert(operators in $L.filed, 1, 1, $cau.operator.name))
if (filename($L.filed)="ocmgroups") then if $cau.add.to.group then (members in $L.filed=insert(members in $L.filed, 1, 1, $cau.operator.name))
if (filename($L.filed)="cm3groups") then if $cau.add.to.group then (members in $L.filed=insert(members in $L.filed, 1, 1, $cau.operator.name))
if (filename($L.filed)="ocmgroups") then if $cau.add.to.group then (approvers in $L.filed=insert(approvers in $L.filed, 1, 1, $cau.operator.name))
if (filename($L.filed)="cm3groups") then if $cau.add.to.group then (approvers in $L.filed=insert(approvers in $L.filed, 1, 1, $cau.operator.name))
